title: Call with new CEO
content: Positive feedback from the new CEO Oscar Garcia Maceiras, on Q1 performance. He was appointed CEO of Inditex on December 2024, succeding Carlos Crespo, as part of the broader leadership reshuffle aimed at ensuring continuity and accelerating Inditex´s global expansion and digital transformation.
author: Monica Gomez Acebo

title: Integration for greater efficiency
content: Positive feedback from the new CEO Oscar Garcia Maceiras, on Q1 performance. He was appointed CEO of Inditex on December 2024, succeding Carlos Crespo, as part of the broader leadership reshuffle aimed at ensuring continuity and accelerating Inditex´s global expansion and digital transformation.
author: Monica Gomez Acebo

title: Internal Meeting
content: Internal meeting with the team to discuss the new strategy. We also discussed the new product roadmap.
author: Monica Gomez Acebo

title: Bank of America approach
content: Bank of America approach to the market. We discussed the new strategy. We also discussed the new product roadmap.
author: Monica Gomez Acebo
